attributes.action: Prosecute MP's of ALL parties for fraud who have claimed for items that do not fall within the remit of the Green Book or who have over claimed for ALL over items, this to include MP's who have declared that they will pay back money for overclaimed items.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
